name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi 7th Birthday Live ＂Sweet Pop Story＂ 新衣装お披露目＆重大発表【#AZKi生誕ライブ2025】 [gdQ4eN9wzZg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: AZKi and Tsunomaki Watame perform a duet of 'Sweet Night, Sweet Time'.
MC section where AZKi recaps the guest performances so far and introduces the next part.

subtitles.original: 眠くないよ 眠くないの
subtitles.english: I'm not sleepy, I'm not sleepy.

subtitles.original: sweet night, sweet time...
subtitles.english: sweet night, sweet time...

subtitles.original: まだまだ遊びたい
subtitles.english: I still want to play more.

subtitles.original: sweet night, sweet time...
subtitles.english: sweet night, sweet time...

subtitles.original: 話したいよ 話し足んないの
subtitles.english: I want to talk, I haven't talked enough.

subtitles.original: 夢の中じゃ物足りないから
subtitles.english: Because it's not enough in my dreams.

subtitles.original: 今夜は 眠れ眠らない
subtitles.english: Tonight, sleep... don't sleep,

subtitles.original: きみとリズム合わせ
subtitles.english: syncing rhythms with you.

subtitles.original: 昼夜逆転を楽しむの
subtitles.english: I'm enjoying day and night reversal.

subtitles.original: 今だけ 眠れ眠らない
subtitles.english: Just for now, sleep... don't sleep,

subtitles.original: 星空散歩して
subtitles.english: walking in the starry sky.

subtitles.original: 夜がどうか 明けないように
subtitles.english: May the night somehow not end.

subtitles.original: いつまでも sweet night, sweet time...
subtitles.english: Forever, sweet night, sweet time...

subtitles.original: いつまでも sweet night, sweet time...
subtitles.english: Forever, sweet night, sweet time...

subtitles.original: きっと話すのも笑うのも
subtitles.english: Surely talking and laughing too,

subtitles.original: もっと誰かと繋がるために
subtitles.english: to connect more with someone.

subtitles.original: ちょっと俯いたきみへ向けて
subtitles.english: Towards you, who looked down a little,

subtitles.original: 一晩中 歌ってもいい
subtitles.english: it's okay to sing all night long.

subtitles.original: sweet night, sweet time... 眠らないよ 眠らないの
subtitles.english: sweet night, sweet time... I won't sleep, I won't sleep.

subtitles.original: sweet night, sweet time... 夜ごと遊びたい
subtitles.english: sweet night, sweet time... I want to play every night.

subtitles.original: sweet night, sweet time... 喋りたいよ 喋り足んないの
subtitles.english: sweet night, sweet time... I want to talk, I haven't talked enough.

subtitles.original: sweet night, sweet time... きみと朝まで
subtitles.english: sweet night, sweet time... with you until morning.

subtitles.original: 月も知らない
subtitles.english: Even the moon doesn't know.

subtitles.original: ナイショ話を
subtitles.english: A secret talk...

subtitles.original: パジャマのままで
subtitles.english: still in our pajamas.

subtitles.original: お願い 夢の中じゃ物足りないから
subtitles.english: Please, because it's not enough in my dreams.

subtitles.original: もう少し 眠れ眠らない
subtitles.english: A little more, sleep... don't sleep,

subtitles.original: きみとリズム合わせ
subtitles.english: syncing rhythms with you.

subtitles.original: 昼夜逆転を楽しむの
subtitles.english: I'm enjoying day and night reversal.

subtitles.original: 今だけ 眠れ眠らない
subtitles.english: Just for now, sleep... don't sleep,

subtitles.original: 白昼夢見送って
subtitles.english: sending off the daydream.

subtitles.original: 夜を越えよう
subtitles.english: Let's get through the night.

subtitles.original: また明日もここで会おう
subtitles.english: Let's meet here again tomorrow.

subtitles.original: good night, good time... また明日
subtitles.english: good night, good time... see you tomorrow.

subtitles.original: good night, good time... また明日
subtitles.english: good night, good time... see you tomorrow.

subtitles.original: good night, good time... また明日
subtitles.english: good night, good time... see you tomorrow.

subtitles.original: good night, good time...
subtitles.english: good night, good time...

subtitles.original: というわけで ゲストブロックお送りしました！
subtitles.english: And so, that was the guest block!

subtitles.original: どうだったかな？ どうだったかな？
subtitles.english: How was it? How was it?

subtitles.original: はい。ということでゲストパートなんですが、ここまでを振り返ると
subtitles.english: Yes. So, for the guest part, looking back on what we've seen so far...

subtitles.original: いろはちゃんと『心予報』お届けしました！
subtitles.english: I performed "Kokoro Yoho" with Iroha-chan!

subtitles.original: なんとね、いろはちゃんのあの新衣装3Dでね、一緒にこれはあずいろてぇてぇ
subtitles.english: Amazingly, with Iroha-chan in that new 3D outfit, we did some "AzuIro te-te" together.

subtitles.original: あずいろてぇてぇをしたいと思って
subtitles.english: I really wanted to experience some "AzuIro te-te",

subtitles.original: 一緒にね、歌ってみたを出した『心予報』をちょっと踊って
subtitles.english: so we danced a bit to "Kokoro Yoho," which we'd released a cover of together,

subtitles.original: 一緒にこの新衣装であずいろてぇてぇしました。
subtitles.english: and showed off our "AzuIro te-te" in this new outfit.

subtitles.original: どうだった？ どうだった？ 良かったでしょう？
subtitles.english: How was it? How was it? It was good, right?

subtitles.original: そして、次はラミィちゃんと『初恋パティシエール』という
subtitles.english: And next, with Lamy-chan, we sang "Hatsukoi Patissiere",

subtitles.original: ラミィちゃんのオリ曲をね、もうこのライブのテーマに絶対合うと思って
subtitles.english: Lamy-chan's original song, which I thought would definitely fit the theme of this live,

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌わせていただきました。
subtitles.english: together.

subtitles.original: 可愛かった！
subtitles.english: It was so cute!

subtitles.original: そしてそして、団長と『ホメノビ』！
subtitles.english: And then, with Danchou, "Homenobi"!

subtitles.original: これはね、ずっとずっとあずき一緒に団長とホメノビを歌うのが夢だったんで
subtitles.english: Singing "Homenobi" with Danchou has been a dream of mine for a long, long time,

subtitles.original: もうこのライブで実現するぞと思って
subtitles.english: so I decided to make it happen at this live,

subtitles.original: ホメノビで成長していきたいと甘えました。
subtitles.english: and I indulged myself, wanting to grow through "Homenobi".

subtitles.original: そしてそして、わためと一緒に、わためのオリジナル曲
subtitles.english: And then, with Watame, we sang Watame's original song,

subtitles.original: 『Sweet Night, Sweet Time』を歌わせていただきました。
subtitles.english: "Sweet Night, Sweet Time" together.

subtitles.original: もうこれもね、今回のコンセプトにめちゃくちゃ合う、わためとこの曲一緒に歌いたいなって思って選曲しました。
subtitles.english: This song also fits perfectly with this time's concept, and I chose it because I really wanted to sing it with Watame.

subtitles.original: どうだったかなー？
subtitles.english: How was it?

subtitles.original: いや、嬉しいね、ホロメンのオリ曲歌ったりできるの、本当にライブならではという感じで
subtitles.english: Man, I'm so happy. Being able to sing Holomem original songs really feels like a special live concert experience.

subtitles.original: お送りしましたが...
subtitles.english: We presented those, but...

subtitles.original: まだまだゲストパート続きますんで
subtitles.english: the guest part still continues.

subtitles.original: セトリストのあずきさんにもご注目ください！
subtitles.english: Please also keep an eye on setlist-AZKi!

subtitles.original: ということで、まだまだゲストパートいくぞ！
subtitles.english: So, here we go, more guest parts!
